Summary._: Northbound [F] stopping along [A] line Jay St to W 4 St. 71 Av-bound [M] will end at Essex St because of a sick passenger at B'way-Lafayette.

Description._:
Northbound [F] trains are stopping along the [A] line Jay St-MetroTech to W 4 St-Washington Sq.

71 Av-bound [M] trains will end at Essex St-Delancey St.

These service changes are because of a sick passenger at B'way-Lafayette.

Expect delays on the [A], [F], [M] trains.

LongDescription:
Northbound [F] trains are stopping along the [A] line Jay St-MetroTech to W 4 St-Washington Sq.
71 Av-bound [M] trains will end at Essex St-Delancey St.
These service changes are because of a sick passenger at B'way-Lafayette.
Expect delays on the [A], [F], [M] trains.

Summary._: [B] and [D] trains have service changes and delays because of an investigation on the Manhattan Bridge. See mta.info

Description._:
There is no [B] train service between Coney Island-Stillwell Av and Bedford Park Blvd in both directions.

There is no [D] train service between B'way-Lafayette and 36 St (Bklyn) in both directions.

Southbound [D] trains are stopping along the [F] line from W 4 St-Washington Sq to 2 Av, then end.

Some northbound [Q] trains are stopping along the [R] line from DeKalb Av to Canal St

[Q] trains are running with delays in both directions.

These service changes are because of an investigation on the Manhattan Bridge.

Expect delays in [D] [F] [Q] and [R] service.

LongDescription:
There is no [B] train service between Coney Island-Stillwell Av and Bedford Park Blvd in both directions.
There is no [D] train service between B'way-Lafayette and 36 St (Bklyn) in both directions.
Southbound [D] trains are stopping along the [F] line from W 4 St-Washington Sq to 2 Av, then end.
Some northbound [Q] trains are stopping along the [R] line from DeKalb Av to Canal St
[Q] trains are running with delays in both directions. 
These service changes are because of an investigation on the Manhattan Bridge. 
Expect delays in [D] [F] [Q] and [R] service.

Summary._: Southbound [D] trains are running local from Bedford Pk Blvd to Tremont Av because of signal problems at Fordham Rd.

Description._: Southbound [D] trains are running local from Bedford Pk Blvd to Tremont Av because of signal problems at Fordham Rd.

LongDescription: Southbound [D] trains are running local from Bedford Pk Blvd to Tremont Av because of signal problems at Fordham Rd.
